animating_particle_effect.description: [particles] The particle effect to play (looping) while the animation is playing.

animating_done_particle_effect.description: [particles] The particle effect to trigger when the animation has been completed.

particles_position_offset.description: [gizmo_position] The offset from the unit origo that the particles will be spawned at (in meters).

animation_acceleration.description: The acceleration applied to the movement of the animated node. (in m/s)

animation_angular_time.description: The amount of time it will take for the animation to rotate target_rotation_amount (in seconds).

target_rotation_amount.description: The amount of rotation in radians that the node will be rotated with around x/y axis. (rads)

animate_down_node.description: [node] The node in the unit that is animated (moved).

group_to_visualize.description: [string] The visibility group that will be set to visible.

particles_inherit_rotation.description: Wether or not the spawned particles should inherit the world-rotation from the node which they are spawned from.

impulse_multiplier.description: The multiplier to apply to the impulse in order to increase or decrease the magnitude of the impulse applied from whatever destroyed it.

torque_multiplier.description: The multiplier to apply to the torque in order to increase or decrease the magnitude of the torque applied from whatever destroyed it.
